item.title: Raichur police arrest notorious burglar, seize valuables worth Rs 7.89 lakh
item.description:
<![CDATA[RAICHUR: The Raichur Rural police have arrested a notorious burglar, identified as Viresh from LBS Nagar in Raichur, who was involved in house thefts across the district. The police have recovered stolen goods worth Rs 7.89 lakh, including gold and silver ornaments.
The accused had multiple cases registered against him in different police stations in Raichur. With his arrest, the police recovered 76 grams of gold ornaments, 382 grams of silver ornaments, watches, cameras and other stolen items ...]]>

item.title: Foundation stone laid for new Sindhanur-Raichur rail line
item.description:
<![CDATA[Minister of State for Railways V. Somanna laid the foundation stone for a new railway line between Sindhanur and Raichur in Sindhanur on Thursday. This line is being taken up under the Munirabad (Ginigera)-Raichur new railway line project.
While addressing the gathering, he said that the cost of the new line between Munirabad and Raichur (165 km) is ₹3,402 crore and the line from Sindhanur to Raichur (81 km) is ₹1,205 crore. The 81-km project will be completed by March 2027, he added.
Prime Mi...]]>
